scratchy.title: scratchy
values: JSON-based bot for recording cool stuff.

lolbot.title: lolbot
values: Funny bot that collects funnies and puts them in a funny jar (lol).

monolith.title: Monolith
monolith.desc: Stuff that has to do with project monolith.

linux_commands.title: linux_commands
values: nm will list symbols from object files
pdfunite combines multiple pdfs into one
watch grep -e Dirty: -e Writeback: /proc/meminfo will tell you how close your USB drive is to being able to be safely removed
sshfs will mount a remote directory as a local one through ssh
strace and ltrace log calls to system functions and libraries, respectively
xdotool can send keystrokes and mouse actions to a window
fbgrab will take a screenshot of a terminal
PSA: baobab is a really neat tool to graphically show disk usage on linux
